name: Join The Waltz
description:
You need to get to the other side of the ballroom!

Left-click to dance with someone.

Left-click on someone to throw him away!

Blue guys can tank darts and yellow ones make dancers turn around you. Beware of the evil mens in the bushes!

Made in 48h for the GMTK Jam 2021.

Sound design: Hivernote,    Art and Code: Caberu
